mapper.select: SELECT q.* FROM t_question q LEFT JOIN t_day_question dq ON q.id=dq.id WHERE dq.log_date=date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY q.id

(SELECT id FROM t_question WHERE is_del=FALSE and type='2' ORDER BY id LIMIT 2) UNION (SELECT id FROM t_question WHERE is_del=FALSE and type='1' ORDER BY id LIMIT 2) UNION (SELECT id FROM t_question WHERE is_del=FALSE and (type='3' or type='4') ORDER BY id LIMIT 1)
